Posts.Content: Hi  Really sorry to read the sad news you’ve received.....you are doing well it’s just hard sometimes when things keep comimg at you. We all need to have a rant sometimes. Hope those antibiotics kick in x fast for you. Hope things go ok when u meet up with your family. Dont be hard on yourself x scream x shout on hear when you need to. Hugs to you x no apologies needed Xxxx
Posts.Title: April diagnosis group

Posts.Content: Hi I have TNB can x I’ve had a mastectomy no node involvement grade 3. I’m getting FecT chemo x 6sessions x then radiotherapy. I’m not sure what fec75 is? Good luck with everything hope it all goes well for you. Xxxxx
Posts.Title: TNBC FEC 75

Posts.Content: Thank you Ruby Rose for those tips, I’ll make sure I follow them. I hope everything is going well with you, it’s a beautiful day here today, Hope you get to relax and enjoy a little sunshine  Sending good vibes and smiles  xxx
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi We are the other way round my boobs gone but not started chemo yet. Go for the party any excuse... loving my new boob already x only just started reconstruction new nipples picked x will be with me in a day or two.  Good luck with everythin.... Will remember what u said when I’m trying the cold cap. Hope u keeping well x everything going as good as it can for you... I won’t be far behind.  Get planning your party.
